long_description: Accept no imitations! Our Vivif is a very flashy swimbait with lots of wiggling, wobbling action. Vibrant Holographic colors flash and shimmer in the water. The high dorsal fin acts like a rudder to swim true on the retrieve. Long shank Mustad Hook secured to heavy weight inside for deeper countdown trolling. In addition, Vivif swimbaits are heavier than other swimbaits, allowing them to swim and cat better. These classic vivifs can be used in fresh or salt water.
